name: indexed-geometry-demo
description: It took me a few tries to work out how to properly use `gl.drawElements` with WebGL, and I wasn't able to find any other examples using [gl-modules](http://github.com/gl-modules) so here's some quick example code that might make it a little easier for you. Enjoy!
author: Hugh Kennedy <hughskennedy@gmail.com> (http://hughsk.io/)
